**The Supreme Three-Five Orthodox Unity Covenant of Might Register**

**Title:** *The Supreme Three-Five Orthodox Unity Covenant of Might Register*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties, affiliated with the early Celestial Master Dao’s ritual ordinances. Annotations within include Song-dynasty place names, likely added by later disciples. Six fascicles.

**Source:** *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, Orthodox Unity Section, First Subsection.

---

**Fascicle One of *The Supreme Three-Five Orthodox Unity Covenant of Might Register***

**Chapter One: Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Divine Lad and One General**
The qi responds to the first solar term of the first month, its day residing in *Xu* (Void). It governs the *Yangping* precinct, with *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring) falling forty-five days after the winter solstice.

**Chapter Two: Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Divine Lads and Ten Generals**
The radiance responds to the mid-first month, its day residing in *Wei* (Rooftop). It governs the *Lutang* precinct, with *Yushui* (Rain Water) falling sixty days after the winter solstice.

**Chapter Three: Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity One Hundred Fifty Generals**
The radiance responds to the first solar term of the second month, its day residing in *Shi* (House) and *Bi* (Wall). It governs the *Heming* precinct, with *Jingzhe* (Awakening of Insects) falling seventy-five days after the winter solstice.

**Chapter Four: Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Three Generals**
The radiance responds to the mid-second month, its day residing in *Kui* (Straddler). It governs the *Liyuan* precinct, with *Chunfen* (Spring Equinox) falling ninety days after the winter solstice.

---

**Chapter One: Tallies of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Divine Lad and One General**
The *Yangping* precinct’s Left Pacifying Radiance Libationer, affiliated with Metal, resides in *Jiulong* County of *Pengzhou*, associated with *Xu* (Void), and lodges at the *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring) solar term of the first month.

In the such-and-such year, such-and-such month, such-and-such day of the first lunar day, so-and-so of such-and-such prefecture, commandery, county, village, and hamlet, born on such-and-such month, day, and hour, originally under the governance of the such-and-such Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, declares: Having been summoned by the Five Dark Divine Lad Lords, so-and-so, a flesh-born mortal of this life, has long possessed the capacity for the Dao. Having encountered the Great Way, I respectfully offer ritual gifts and present myself at such-and-such sacred mountain, such-and-such abbey or oratory, to submit under the tutelage of such-and-such Dharma Master. I humbly receive the *Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Divine Lad and One General*. After being invested with the true officers of the register, I shall cultivate and practice in strict accordance with the statutes and methods. I hereby respectfully submit this petition.

**Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Three Generals, Chapter Four**
The Zhenli Yuan governance, under the Right Eternal Prosperity Libationer, belongs to Earth, located in Jiulong County of Pengzhou, corresponding to the Astral Mansion of Kui, during the mid-second month of spring equinox.

The Dharma-register disciple [Name], whose fate is governed by the [specific] Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, having cultivated the Dao with diligent devotion and rendered meritorious service in conversion, whose sincerity remains unflagging and whose progress in the Way renews daily, has been summoned by the Three Black Lords of the Supreme Primordial, and on this day receives appointment. In accordance with the ancient rites of the Heavenly Master, [Name] now reverently receives the *Register of the Supreme Lord Lao’s Left, Right, and Central Three Generals*, with ninety million troops and attendants bound to the body by command.

One Left Upper Immortal Concealing Body Grand General,
Surname Tang, given name Hong, style Wenming,
Seventy-two *zhang* in height,
Wearing a crimson brocade cap and unlined robe,
Holding a golden talisman and bearing a sword,
Leading three hundred thousand troops,
Descending from the five-black floating clouds into [Name]’s left kidney,
Generating the hundred meridians to strengthen [Name]’s body.
*Red essence, yellow embrace, black sash, green shoes, vermilion soles.*

One Right Upper Spirit Concealing Shadow Grand General,
Surname Ge, given name Yong, style Wendu,
Seventy-two *zhang* in height,
Wearing a crimson brocade cap and unlined robe,
Holding a jade halberd and bearing a sword,
Leading thirty million troops,
Riding crimson-black floating clouds into [Name]’s right kidney,
Generating the hundred meridians to strengthen [Name]’s body.
*Red essence, red embrace, earthen sash, green belt, vermilion shoes.*

One Central Upper Perfected Concealing Form Grand General,
Surname Zhou, given name Wu, style Wengang,
Ninety-two *zhang* in height,
Wearing a crimson brocade cap and unlined robe,
Holding a vermilion yang tally and bearing a sword,
Leading thirty million troops,
Riding triple-five crimson-black floating clouds into [Name]’s body to strengthen [Name]’s form.
*Red essence, yellow embrace, earthen sash, green shoes, vermilion soles.*

Presiding over the *Geji* administration,
One hundred and five days after the winter solstice: Pure Brightness.

Flaming brilliance responds to the third lunar month, its day governed by *Wei*,

**Fifth Chapter: Summoning the Hundred Ghosts of the Upper Numinous Register**
The *Geji* administration governs the Left Metropolis, overseen by the *Xi* Libationer,
Assigned to fire, located in Jiulong County of Pengzhou,
Corresponding to the *Lou* constellation,
The Pure Brightness third lunar node.

This dharma-register disciple [Name], whose fate is bound to the [specific] Star Lord of the Northern Dipper,
Now presents incense and offerings to the gate of [Title] Dharma Master,
Seeking to receive the *Upper Numinous Hundred Ghosts Summoning Register*,
Internally to cultivate the body, externally to save others,
To execute the perverse and eradicate evil,
To ascend and deliver the seven ancestors,
To summon and command all spirits,
Who shall arrive at the utterance of the command,
And may not presume to trespass without summons.
Upon receiving this register, [Name] shall abide by all statutes and covenants,
And may not violate them.
Should violation occur, [Name] willingly accepts netherworld punishment.
*Hastily, hastily, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances!*

**The Supreme Orthodox Unity Primordial Mandate of the Chaotic Crimson-Green Register, Sixth Grade**

The **Right Metropolitan Director of Zhen-Gengyin-Gu, Attendant Libationer Xi**, affiliated with Water, resides in Mianzhu County of Hanzhou, corresponding to the Stomach Mansion and the Grain Rain solar term of the third lunar month.

The register disciple [Name], born under the governance of the [X] Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, having long been summoned by the Central Di in the ranks, now respectfully presents incense and offerings at the gate of the Dharma Master, seeking to receive the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Primordial Mandate of the Crimson Heaven’s Three-Five Chaotic Crimson Register**. Upon its bestowal, the true officials within the register shall don their solemn vestments and descend into the disciple’s body. After receiving this mandate, [Name] shall abide by all statutes and covenants without transgression. Should any violation occur, [Name] willingly accepts the judgment of the netherworld. *Hasten, hasten, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances!*

Zhen Zhen Duo Zhi, Right Director, Divine Sacrificial Wine Officer Xi, associated with water, stationed in Jintang County of Hanzhou, corresponding to the *Bi* constellation, during the fourth month of the solar term *Lesser Fullness*.

The disciple of the Dharma Register, so-and-so, whose fate is governed by the Star Lord of the Northern Dipper’s such-and-such star, now respectfully offers Dharma tokens and presents himself at the gate of such-and-such Dharma Master to receive the *Orthodox Unity’s Register of the Nine Provinces’ Earth Altars*. Dispatched to inspect the famous mountains, rivers, marshes, and lakes of the Nine Provinces; the Five Peaks and Four Floods; the Five Lakes and Four Seas; the thirty-six states; and the twelve thousand townships and villages—traversing the upper, middle, and lower primal extremities, encompassing east, west, south, and north—summon all malevolent ghosts and black legions of the myriad demons to appear without delay or evasion. Heal the myriad people, and in accordance with the Dharma, subdue and register the twelve hundred ghosts. May the ten thousand spirits ever attend at his left and right, prolonging life and augmenting years, eliminating misfortune and transcending calamity.

Upon receiving and wearing this register, so-and-so shall abide by all regulations and covenants. Should he violate them, he willingly accepts the punishments of the netherworld and dares not harbor resentment. Through diligent cultivation and sincerity, he shall be appointed this very day. The vanguard clerks and soldiers, previously summoned by the Divine Lord of the Luminous Dao of the Central Realm, now present themselves to receive their commissions. Respectfully submitted.

**The Supreme Sovereign’s Talismans for All Lords**
Inscribed in vermilion on peachwood slips, one foot and six inches in length, the center of the slip sealed with the talisman of the Heavenly Emperor’s Envoy. The talisman board is entrusted to the jade clerks and soldiers, bound with hempen cords and sealed with silk, to be deployed as needed for summons and inquiries. Do not disclose this true and precious talisman. Do not summon without cause. Those who carry this register and talisman shall be recognized by all ghosts, who will cross their hands, raise their staffs, and bow their heads beneath the Supreme Clarity to receive it. Ghosts who disobey shall be beheaded and executed. Hasten! As the statutes and ordinances command.

When first receiving the talisman, the disciple swears before the August Heavenly Lord of the Great Dao, the Penetrating Supreme Sovereign of the Nine Palaces’ Primal Extremity, that divine youths and jade maidens shall attend him, escorting him to ascend and roam the Nine Heavens. In all his comings and goings among men, whatever he summons shall arrive instantly, daring not to violate the statutes and ordinances.

Wang Yanling knows this through contemplation, ensuring that people remain free from illness. Entering water, they shall fear no winds or waves; entering battle, they shall not be harmed by armor or weapons. All shall proceed in accordance with the statutes, laws, and ordinances.

To summon the spirits of the myriad beings, inscribe the talisman in cinnabar on peachwood slips, one foot and six inches in length, and seal it with the Heavenly Emperor’s Envoy talisman. Summon ghosts with the left cord, and the spirits shall arrive instantly. Those who wear the talisman shall be feared by all ghosts. Knowing the names of the great ghosts, none shall dare to cause harm. The names of the earth spirits of all provinces govern their respective counties, townships, and villages within their domains. The earth altar lords must not permit malevolent spirits, ghosts, or demons to consume blood offerings. For the great and small mountain spirits who do not submit, summon them in accordance with the Dharma, and the ghosts shall respond like an echo, arriving instantly. Hasten! Summon and inquire into the origins of matters as required.

The method for transmitting talismans: adjust the color and dimensions according to the recipient’s birth year. Provide one knife and one pair of rings. The talisman master takes one ring and the accompanying items, while the other is given to the principal to retain as a token of the master’s talisman authority. Those deemed capable may be appointed with the approval of Xu Shen. Do not transmit to unworthy recipients. The principal must examine and deliberate carefully. How could one not be cautious?

Hasten! As the statutes and ordinances command.

To perceive spirits in the ghostly realms: take white quartz, one ghost general named Ghost Supervisor, and poria, three ingredients in equal measure. Grind them finely, and ingest a one-*cun* measure—ghosts shall appear.

Another method for perceiving spirits: take white quartz, fuling, and anemarrhena, three ingredients in equal measure. Grind them finely, and ingest a one-*daogui* measure—ghosts shall appear at once.

Another formula: magpie fledglings, red quartz, azurite, and night-glowing powder; or onion seeds, lindera, white quartz, and anemarrhena powder—all enable one to see ghosts, who shall then fear the living.

*Tai Shang Zheng Yi Resolving the Six Harms Divine Talisman Register*, Chapter Eleven
**Governor of the Gushing Spring, Ruling the Left Supervisor Spirit Qi Ritual Libationer**, affiliated with Water, located in Deyang County of Hanzhou, corresponding to the Ghost Star, at the Minor Heat solar term of the sixth lunar month.

[Name], a disciple of the Dharma Registers, whose destiny is governed by the [Name] Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, now respectfully presents ritual offerings to the abode of [Name] Dharma Master, petitioning to receive the *Tai Shang Tai Yi Lord’s Limitless Most High Primordial Unity Lord’s Limitless Resolving the Six Harms Secret Register*, born of the Heavenly Thearch, nurtured by August Heaven, borne by August Earth, illumined by the Sun and Moon, assisted by the Northern Dipper, traversing mountains and rivers, protected by the myriad spirits, attended by the hundred gods, supported by yin and yang, escorted by the Wind Earl, sheltered by purple clouds, healed by divine medicines. Coming and going without limit, entering the sea and emerging in heaven, passing through gates into rivers and exiting through earthly portals, the Destiny Controller of the Earthly Door grants me the Heavenly Kitchen. What do I seek to be fed? What do I lack to be provided? One meal is unfathomable, a thousand years linked to destiny. The Sun and Moon align with Heaven, the limitless with Earth. Ascending without end, the celestial mechanism harnesses the stellar pivots. Wherever I ride, whatever I point toward—none dare oppose me, for I receive the teachings and commands of the Most High Heavenly Thearch. Dragons and tigers support me, the Vermilion Bird guides me, the Dark Warrior follows me. On the left, the yang-aligned Bluegreen Dragon; on the right, the yin-aligned White Tiger. My head bears the Seven Stars, aligning with the Celestial Dipper to command destiny and retain my life. The Recorder protects me, illnesses depart from me, thieves and bandits avoid me. All I seek is attained, all I suppress is subdued. Crossing rivers and traversing seas, wind and waves do not rise. Tigers and wolves seeing me break their fangs and teeth. The cinnabar script serves as a talisman—misfortunes and calamities perish. Yu clears the path, Chiyou averts warfare. Heavenly talismans and earthly seals open before and close behind. Longevity is without limit, enduring as Heaven itself. Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Jade Decree.

The Heavenly Thearch gives birth to me,
August Heaven nurtures me,
Sun and Moon illuminate me,
The Northern Dipper assists me,
Mountains and rivers guide me,
The hundred spirits attend me,
Yin and Yang flow through me,
The Wind Earl escorts me,
The Heavenly Kitchen provisions me,
Purple clouds canopy me,
Divine medicines heal me.

I traverse without end:
Entering the sea, I emerge at Heaven’s Gate;
Entering the river, I exit at Earth’s Portal.
The Director of Destinies elevates me—
What desire remains unfulfilled?
What aim remains unmet?
One meal sustains a thousand years,
My fate linked to the sun and moon,
Coeternal with Heaven and Earth,
Ascending the celestial mechanism,
Mounting the *Kui* and riding the *Gang*.
Where I point, all perishes.

This disciple receives the divine talisman of the Supreme Thearch.
The receiver dares to bear this charge:
August Heaven covers me,
Dragon and Tiger envoys serve me,
Vermilion Phoenix leads me,
Dark Warrior follows me,
Left Yang adheres to the Azure Dragon,
Right Yin rests upon the White Tiger.
My head bears the Seven Stars,
My dharma aligns with the Celestial Dipper.
The Director of Destinies preserves my years,
The Recorder of Deeds guards my life.
Illness flees me,
Official matters depart me,
Bandits and thieves avoid me,
The host of stars brightens my path,
Heaven’s *qi* benefits me,
Earth’s *qi* stabilizes me.

Crossing rivers and seas,
Wind and waves do not rise.
Tigers and wolves seeing me
Break their fangs and shatter their teeth.

Cinnabar script in ninefold transmission
Repels and dispels calamities.
White silk as talisman
Eradicates misfortune and harm.
Yu clears the path,
Chiyou averts warfare.
Prolonging years to the utmost limit,
I complete my destiny with Heaven.

*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances!*

chunks.translated_text:
**The Supreme Three-Five Orthodox Unity Covenant of Might Register**

**Title:** *The Supreme Three-Five Orthodox Unity Covenant of Might Register*. Author unknown, approximately composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties, affiliated with the early Celestial Master Dao’s ritual ordinances. Annotations within include Song-dynasty place names, likely added by later disciples. Six fascicles.

**Source:** *Zhengtong Daoist Canon*, Orthodox Unity Section, First Subsection.

---

**Fascicle One of *The Supreme Three-Five Orthodox Unity Covenant of Might Register***

**Chapter One: Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Divine Lad and One General**
The qi responds to the first solar term of the first month, its day residing in *Xu* (Void). It governs the *Yangping* precinct, with *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring) falling forty-five days after the winter solstice.

**Chapter Two: Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Divine Lads and Ten Generals**
The radiance responds to the mid-first month, its day residing in *Wei* (Rooftop). It governs the *Lutang* precinct, with *Yushui* (Rain Water) falling sixty days after the winter solstice.

**Chapter Three: Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity One Hundred Fifty Generals**
The radiance responds to the first solar term of the second month, its day residing in *Shi* (House) and *Bi* (Wall). It governs the *Heming* precinct, with *Jingzhe* (Awakening of Insects) falling seventy-five days after the winter solstice.

**Chapter Four: Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Three Generals**
The radiance responds to the mid-second month, its day residing in *Kui* (Straddler). It governs the *Liyuan* precinct, with *Chunfen* (Spring Equinox) falling ninety days after the winter solstice.

---

**Chapter One: Tallies of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Divine Lad and One General**
The *Yangping* precinct’s Left Pacifying Radiance Libationer, affiliated with Metal, resides in *Jiulong* County of *Pengzhou*, associated with *Xu* (Void), and lodges at the *Lichun* (Beginning of Spring) solar term of the first month.

In the such-and-such year, such-and-such month, such-and-such day of the first lunar day, so-and-so of such-and-such prefecture, commandery, county, village, and hamlet, born on such-and-such month, day, and hour, originally under the governance of the such-and-such Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, declares: Having been summoned by the Five Dark Divine Lad Lords, so-and-so, a flesh-born mortal of this life, has long possessed the capacity for the Dao. Having encountered the Great Way, I respectfully offer ritual gifts and present myself at such-and-such sacred mountain, such-and-such abbey or oratory, to submit under the tutelage of such-and-such Dharma Master. I humbly receive the *Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity Divine Lad and One General*. After being invested with the true officers of the register, I shall cultivate and practice in strict accordance with the statutes and methods. I hereby respectfully submit this petition.

**One Celestial Capital Direct Envoy Merit Officer,**
**One Celestial Capital Orthodox Unity Merit Officer.**

**The Supreme Orthodox Unity Primordial Mandate of the Chaotic Crimson-Green Register, Sixth Grade**

The **Right Metropolitan Director of Zhen-Gengyin-Gu, Attendant Libationer Xi**, affiliated with Water, resides in Mianzhu County of Hanzhou, corresponding to the Stomach Mansion and the Grain Rain solar term of the third lunar month.

The register disciple [Name], born under the governance of the [X] Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, having long been summoned by the Central Di in the ranks, now respectfully presents incense and offerings at the gate of the Dharma Master, seeking to receive the **Supreme Orthodox Unity Primordial Mandate of the Crimson Heaven’s Three-Five Chaotic Crimson Register**. *Qi* responds to the fourth lunar month’s solar term. On this day, in the *Yi* trigram, it governs the central region of Qin. **Establishment of Summer** occurs one hundred thirty-five days after the winter solstice.

*Qi* responds to the middle of the fourth lunar month. On this day, in the *Bi* constellation, it governs the realm of Zhen Duo. **Grain Full** occurs one hundred fifty days after the winter solstice.

**Chapter Seven: The Register for Summoning the Hundred Ghosts of the Orthodox Unity’s Upper Immortals**
The **Left Administering Divine Officer Xi Jijiu**, governing the central region of Qin, belongs to the element of Water. Located in Deyang County of Hanzhou, it corresponds to the *Xu* constellation. **Establishment of Summer** occurs on the solar term of the fourth lunar month.

chunks.original_text: 仙灵官左朱雀使者十二人， 仙灵官右朱雀使者十二人， 仙灵官科车赤符使者十二人， 仙灵官科车赤符吏十二人， 仙灵官正一使者十二人， 仙灵官左天玄武使者十二人， 仙灵官右天玄武使者十二人， 仙灵官左上九天使者十二人， 仙灵官右上九天使者十二人， 仙灵官左三元四始使者十二人， 仙灵官右三元四始使者十二人， 仙灵官左走虎贲吏十二人， 仙灵官右走虎贲吏十二人。 绿冠黄服绿云被青绿 绿冠红服绿绿青披深青绿朱履 太上正一九州社令录品第八 镇真多治右领神熙祭酒，属水，在汉州金堂县，应毕宿，小满四月中。 某法箓弟子某乙，命属北斗某星君，今谨资法信，诣某法师门下，奉受太上正一九州社令录，遣察行九州名山川泽，五岳四渍，五湖四海，三十六国，万二千乡亭里域，周遍上下元极，束西南北，限召众邪故黑万鬼立到，不得迁历，救治万民，千二百鬼注依法收录，万神常在，左右侍从，延年益寿，除凶度厄，某乙受佩之后，一如科约，不得违背，有违之日，甘当冥考，不敢有恨，修行精诚，即日听署，前部吏兵，素被中治明道神君召，诣臣拜受请给，谨词。 上皇诸君符，朱书桃刺，一尺六寸，刺头当中封天帝使者，印板玉吏兵，芒绳大张，缯彩封题，随以意所言召问，勿传泄吾真宝符，未有所治勿召，自带符录，百鬼即自知之，叉手擎杖，当於泰清下稽首受之，鬼不从者斩而戮之，急急如律令。 臣初受符之时，誓上谓皇天大道君洞达太上元极九宫，神童玉女皆来侍从，乘送迎上游九天，人问出入，举言所召即至，不敢致违律令。 王延陵知之存念，令人不病，入水不畏风浪，入军不被甲兵，一如科法律令。 东方青帝姓昊名晓， 南方赤帝姓刘名嚣， 西方白帝姓一及名敖， 北方黑帝姓夏名禹， 京师社天之心神，姓黄名崇， 冀州社天之头神，姓冯名迁， 刻州社天之腹神，姓张名贱， 徐州社天之胸神，姓夏名意，一名符一名前。 梁州社天之喉神，姓范名扎，一名礼。 雍州社天之背神，姓杨名谦， 兖州社天之膊神，姓费名前， 扬州社天之足神，姓邹名混， 青州社天之颈神，姓韩名育， 益州社天之眉神，姓颜名理， 幽州社天之手神，姓戚名季， 伍子胥主庙祇， 狱丞姓名下令除，主诸社神，有坐不召， 符吏即天上主录，姓贾名衍主捕鬼， 都官从事姓陈名松，主诸司马， 天司马空极姓日名巳，主地神， 表道使者姓吕名应，主走道路， 太极令姓朱名雒，主（缺文） 天侯门将军姓邓名训，主武库钱， 日君姓都名神，主天清地浊，带六甲符， 月君姓桂名华，主天下顺逆， 千害杀君姓魏名玄，主诸符吏太岁， 明主公姓樊名贪，主收捕鬼部中百怪， 中都狱丞姓韩名贵，主领天下不法符吏， 天社君姓伍名库，主天下社君。 夫欲召万物神符，丹书桃刺长一尺六寸，封以天帝使者印约，以左索召鬼，其神立至，佩带符百鬼皆畏，人知大鬼姓名，则悉不为害也，凡诸州神名，主其州中所部县乡里域，社君不得令邪精鬼魅血食，大小山神其有不伏者案法召之，鬼应响立至，急急依事召问元由也。 度符法当随生年所属依色寸尺，刀一口环一双，度符师取一环并物，一者付主使存师符信，能者可署明许慎之，不得传非其人也，主者审详之，岂不慎哉。

chunks.translated_text:
To perceive spirits in the ghostly realms: take white quartz, one ghost general named Ghost Supervisor, and poria, three ingredients in equal measure. Grind them finely, and ingest a one-*cun* measure—ghosts shall appear.

Another method for perceiving spirits: take white quartz, fuling, and anemarrhena, three ingredients in equal measure. Grind them finely, and ingest a one-*daogui* measure—ghosts shall appear at once.

Another formula: magpie fledglings, red quartz, azurite, and night-glowing powder; or onion seeds, lindera, white quartz, and anemarrhena powder—all enable one to see ghosts, who shall then fear the living.

*Tai Shang San Wu Zheng Yi Meng Wei Lu*, Scroll Three—concluded.

**Section Ten: The Yellow River Chart Register for Preserving Life**
Qi responds to the midpoint of the fifth lunar month. On its appointed day, the *jing* star governs, stabilizing the upper regions of governance. One hundred eighty days after the winter solstice: Summer Solstice.

**Section Eleven: The Register for Dissolving the Six Harmful Spirits and the Divine Tiger**
Qi responds to the sixth lunar month’s solar term. On its appointed day, the *gui* star governs, stabilizing the *Yongquan* region. Fifteen days after the summer solstice: Minor Heat.

**Section Twelve: The Register of the Nine Phoenixes for Dispelling Impurities**
Qi responds to the midpoint of the sixth lunar month. On its appointed day, the *liu* star governs, stabilizing the *Chougeng* region. Thirty days after the summer solstice: Major Heat.

**Section Nine: The Star Net and Five Dipper Tallies**
Stabilizes the *Lüli* region under the governance of the Left Capital Supervisor and Director of Rites. Corresponds to earth, located in Huai’an Prefecture’s Jintang County. Aligns with purple, the *can* and *er* constellations, and the Grain in Ear solar term of the fifth lunar month.

*Tai Shang Zheng Yi Resolving the Six Harms Divine Talisman Register*, Chapter Eleven
**Governor of the Gushing Spring, Ruling the Left Supervisor Spirit Qi Ritual Libationer**, affiliated with Water, located in Deyang County of Hanzhou, corresponding to the Ghost Star, at the Minor Heat solar term of the sixth lunar month.

[Name], a disciple of the Dharma Registers, whose destiny is governed by the [Name] Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, now respectfully presents ritual offerings to the abode of [Name] Dharma Master, petitioning to receive the *Tai Shang Tai Yi Lord’s Limitless Most High Primordial Unity Lord’s Limitless Resolving the Six Harms Secret Register*, born of the Heavenly Thearch, nurtured by August Heaven, borne by August Earth, illumined by the Sun and Moon, assisted by the Northern Dipper, traversing mountains and rivers, protected by the myriad spirits, attended by the hundred gods, supported by yin and yang, escorted by the Wind Earl, sheltered by purple clouds, healed by divine medicines. Coming and going without limit, entering the sea and emerging in heaven, passing through gates into rivers and exiting through earthly portals, the Destiny Controller of the Earthly Door grants me the Heavenly Kitchen. What do I seek to be fed? What do I lack to be provided? One meal is unfathomable, a thousand years linked to destiny. The Sun and Moon align with Heaven, the limitless with Earth. Ascending without end, the celestial mechanism harnesses the stellar pivots. Wherever I ride, whatever I point toward—none dare oppose me, for I receive the teachings and commands of the Most High Heavenly Thearch. Dragons and tigers support me, the Vermilion Bird guides me, the Dark Warrior follows me. On the left, the yang-aligned Bluegreen Dragon; on the right, the yin-aligned White Tiger. My head bears the Seven Stars, aligning with the Celestial Dipper to command destiny and retain my life. The Recorder protects me, illnesses depart from me, thieves and bandits avoid me. All I seek is attained, all I suppress is subdued. Crossing rivers and traversing seas, wind and waves do not rise. Tigers and wolves seeing me break their fangs and teeth. The cinnabar script serves as a talisman—misfortunes and calamities perish. Yu clears the path, Chiyou averts warfare. Heavenly talismans and earthly seals open before and close behind. Longevity is without limit, enduring as Heaven itself. Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Jade Decree.

*Tai Shang Zheng Yi Nine Phoenixes Dispelling Defilement Register*, Chapter Twelve
**Governor of the Dense Thicket, Ruling the Right Supervisor Spirit Qi Ritual Libationer**, affiliated with Water, located in Xinjin County of Shuzhou, corresponding to the Willow Star, at the Major Heat solar term of the sixth lunar month.

Qi aligns with the seventh lunar month’s solar term. Its stellar day is *Xing*. It governs the Northern Peace Abode. The Autumn Commencement falls forty-five days after the Summer Solstice.

*The Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Florid Canopy for Beheading Demons, Section the Fourteenth*
Qi aligns with the mid-seventh lunar month. Its stellar day is *Zhang*. It governs the Root Bamboo Abode. The Limit of Heat falls sixty days after the Summer Solstice.

*The Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Nine Heavens’ Military Talismans, Section the Fifteenth*

*The Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Nine Offices’ Warding Calamities, Section the Sixteenth*
Qi aligns with the mid-eighth lunar month. Its stellar day is *Jiao*. It governs the Level Canopy Abode. The Autumnal Equinox falls ninety days after the Summer Solstice.

*The Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Complete Seal of All Chapters, Section the Thirteenth*
The Northern Peace Abode’s Left Censor of Qi, Libationer, pertains to Metal. Located in Meishan County of Meizhou, it corresponds to the *Xing* constellation. The Autumn Commencement falls on the seventh lunar month’s solar term.

The disciple of the register, [Name], whose fate is governed by the [specific] Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, now respectfully presents ritual offerings to the master’s gate to receive the *Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Complete Seal of All Chapters*—one thousand two hundred seal-chapters, essential incantations, and the arts of longevity. Along with the twenty-four Jade Maidens, these are to be employed inwardly for self-cultivation and outwardly for saving others, propagating the Daoist teachings, aiding the state and sustaining fate, healing the common folk, and delivering all living beings. After receiving this register, [Name] vows never to violate its precepts. Should there ever be a turning away, false speech, deceit of the master, or slander of the Dao, [Name]’s person shall be punished by the Three Officials of Heaven, Earth, and Water, subjected to the trials of the Wind Blade. The seven generations of ancestors shall be summoned to judgment. *Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

Twenty-four Jade Maidens of the Florid Canopy,
Twenty-four Jade Maidens of the Polishing Mirror,

chunks.original_text: 清灵玉女二十四人， 治病玉女二十四人， 按摩玉女二十四人， 周城玉女二十四人， 挥印玉女二十四人， 印中玉女二十四人， 守印玉女二十四人， 着印玉女二十四人， 升印玉女二十四人， 星药玉女二十四人， 感药玉女二十四人， 放药玉女二十四人， 盖药玉女二十四人， 将药玉女二十四人， 捉药玉女二十四人， 行印玉女二十四人。 右一十八部用印玉女，合四百三十二人，度某乙身中 上仙都促炁功曹十二人北斗君， 上仙都治病功曹十二人太一君， 上仙都天真使者十二人天一君， 上仙都中部使者十二人三炁君， 上仙都正一功曹十二人南斗君， 上仙都直事使者功曹十二人华盖君。 右六部功曹，合七十二人，度某乙身中。 甲子神将符木板从官百二十人， 甲戌神将咒丘明从官百二十人， 甲申神将邓西岳从官百二十人， 甲午神将扶天岳从官百二十人， 甲辰神将孟非卿从官百二十人， 甲寅神将享于始从官百二十人， 甲戌玉女飞廉， 甲子玉女华翼， 甲午玉女素精， 甲申玉女素石， 甲寅玉女惠精， 甲辰玉女开朝藉， 丁丑玉女赵子玉， 丁卯玉女司马卿， 丁酉玉女臧文公， 丁亥玉女张文通， 丁巳玉女崔巨卿， 丁未玉女石叔卿， 癸未玉女吕威明， 癸酉玉女孙仲房， 癸卯玉女苏他家， 癸巳玉女史公来， 癸亥玉女左石松， 癸丑玉女江汉卿。 右六甲六丁六癸玉女，度某乙身中。 太上正一斩邪华盖箓品第十四 镇本竹治右监察炁祭酒，属水，在蜀 州新津县，应张宿，处暑七月中。 某法箓弟子某乙，命属北斗某星 君，言被中皇直使司命无形君召，本意 志仙安魂定魄，义在不死，心和体正， 五宫六府，道一所处，元一飞神，三五 华盖，斩邪仙箓，某以未佩，有负先约， 科行有功，今资法信，诣某法师门下， 请受太上正一斩邪华盖箓，箓中考邪 鬼吏，随逐某身佩受之后，不敢泄露要 文，一如前约律令。 直使功曹二人，

*Register of the Orthodox Unity Florid Canopy for Beheading Demons, Fourteenth Scroll*
Engraved bamboo slip, overseen by the Inspector of Qi, the Libationer—attributed to Water, stationed in Shu Prefecture, Xinjin County, corresponding to the *Zhang* constellation, during the *Chushu* solar term of the seventh month.

The register disciple [Name], whose fate is governed by the [specific] Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, having been summoned by the Invisible Lord of Life Mandate of the Central August Direct Envoys, with the original intent of stabilizing the hun and po souls, aspiring to immortality, harmonizing heart and rectifying body, where the Five Palaces and Six Repositories reside, where the Dao unifies all, where the primordial qi takes flight as spirit, and where the Three-and-Five Florid Canopy beheads demonic registers—[Name], having not yet received this register, has failed the prior covenant. Now, with meritorious conduct in accordance with the statutes, [Name] offers ritual gifts and presents at the gate of the master, requesting to receive the *Register of the Orthodox Unity Florid Canopy for Beheading Demons*. Within this register, demonic officials and ghosts are examined. Upon receiving and wearing it, [Name] shall not dare to disclose its essential texts, as previously sworn by statute and ordinance.

Two Direct Envoys and Celestial Officers...

chunks.original_text: 正一功曹二人， 治病功曹二人， 促炁功曹二人， 斩邪功曹二人， 收邪功曹二人， 录邪功曹二人， 捉邪功曹二人， 缚邪吏二人， 鞭邪吏二人， 科东赤符吏二人， 刚凤骑置吏二人， 驿马上章吏二人， 左将军灭亡吏二人， 右将军灭亡吏二人， 乌衣捕邪吏二人， 束方青云收邪吏二人， 南方赤云收邪吏二人， 西方白云收邪吏二人， 北方黑云收邪吏二人， 中央黄云收邪吏二人， 诛邪吏二人， 破邪吏二人， 考邪吏二人。 东方甲乙青始车骑十万人，衣青衣服来屯某乙身中始生门， 南方丙丁赤玄车骑十万人，衣赤衣服来屯某乙身中防生门， 西方庚辛白玄车骑十万人，衣白衣服来屯某乙身中九生门， 北方壬癸黑玄车骑十万人，衣黑衣服来屯某乙身中养生门， 中央黄始司玄车骑十万人，衣黄衣服来屯某乙身中司命门。 太上正一九天兵符箓品第十五 镇蒙秦治左领功炁祭酒，属金，在夔州台登县，应翼宿，白露八月节。 某法箓弟子某乙命属北斗某星君，今谨赍法信诣某法师门下，求受太上正一九天兵符箓受佩一如律令。 谨给道门领理文书救治百姓，专勤不易，行合天中，堪任加署，谨赍五色彩诣臣求受九天兵符，臣昔於某法师门下受符之日，誓传忠良，今辄於太上御前加署九天兵主，领太上天师千二百官君，五方官属，辅助道门，诛除凶逆，血食符庙，奸神伪鬼，众精故炁，因及九年，有功注名阳官，请左神丞相，号九天九地，万鬼中王，昔出之时，天光地赫，万神震动，身长七十二丈，广七十二围，百二十印绶，前后百二十鼓吹，日夜十二时，卫天帝君，伺斩五方鬼众精故炁，以符召万神千鬼俱灭，急急如皇天大帝太上老君律令。 左灭亡君一十二人， 右灭亡君一十二人，

*Register of the Orthodox Unity Nine Heavens’ Military Talismans*, Chapter Fifteen
Zhen Meng of Qin Prefecture, Left Chief of Qi Cultivation and Libationer, affiliated with Metal, stationed in Kuizhou Taideng County, corresponding to the Wing constellation, during the White Dew solar term of the eighth month.

The register disciple [Name], whose fate is governed by the [specific] Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, now respectfully presents ritual gifts at the gate of the master, requesting to receive and wear the *Register of the Orthodox Unity Nine Heavens’ Military Talismans*, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances.

Duly appointed to manage Daoist documents for the salvation and healing of the people, diligent and unwavering, conduct aligned with the celestial realm, deemed worthy of promotion and endorsement. Respectfully presenting five-colored silks, [Name] seeks to receive the Nine Heavens’ Military Talismans. When I formerly received these talismans at the gate of the master, I swore to transmit them only to the loyal and virtuous. Now, in the presence of the Most High, I endorse [Name] as the Master of the Nine Heavens’ Military Talismans, commanding the 1,200 Official Lords of the Celestial Master and the officials of the Five Directions, to assist the Daoist gate, execute the rebellious, nourish the talismanic shrines, and eradicate false spirits, wayward ghosts, and residual qi. After nine years of meritorious service, [Name]’s name shall be inscribed among the officials of the Yang realm, appointed as the Left Divine Chancellor, titled King of the Nine Heavens and Nine Earths, Sovereign over Myriad Ghosts. When first manifested, heaven blazed and earth radiated, myriad spirits trembled. [Name]’s stature spans seventy-two zhang in height and seventy-two wei in girth, bearing one hundred twenty seals and cords, accompanied by one hundred twenty processional musicians before and behind. Day and night, through the twelve hours, [Name] guards the Heavenly Thearch, awaiting to behead the ghostly multitudes and residual qi of the Five Directions. With this talisman, summoning the myriad spirits and thousand ghosts shall result in their annihilation. Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances of the August Heaven, the Great Emperor, and the Most High Lord Lao.

Twelve Lords of Annihilation of the Left,
Twelve Lords of Annihilation of the Right,

chunks.original_text: 东方青领将军九人，青衣兵士八十一万众来屯左， 左灭亡君一十二人， 右灭亡君一十二人， 西方白领将军七人，白衣兵士四十九万众来屯右， 左灭亡君一十二人， 右灭亡君一十二人， 南方赤领将军八人，赤衣兵士六十四万众来屯前， 左灭亡君一十二人， 右灭亡君一十二人， 北方黑领将军五人，黑衣兵士二十五万众来屯后， 东方青始甲乙君车骑千人衣青二各持泰始青炁来屯某乙始生门， 南方赤玄丙丁君车骑千人衣赤，各持太初赤炁来屯某乙防生门， 西方白玄庚辛君车骑千人衣白，各持太素白炁来屯某乙九生门， 北方黑玄壬癸君车骑千人衣黑，各持太玄黑炁来屯某乙养生门， 中央司玄戊己君车骑千人衣黄，各持太始黄炁来屯某乙司命门， 东方夷老君除逆部伏卫兵， 南方越老君扁鹊伏卫兵， 西方氐老君官死伏卫兵， 北方羌老君及甲错鳞兵， 中央秦老君将领黄兵， 千二百官中央将军身长二十四丈，广十二围，头戴金积冠，百二十印绶，天帝元始召九天符，新出老君传领民祭酒，召九天五方鬼神一切降伏。 太上施虎贲兵三十万众，主收天下荧惑逆鬼邪炁， 太上施天兵三十万众，主收九天乱道逆鬼故炁， 太上发地兵四十万众，主收破地上妄称帝王不正逆鬼， 太上九天丈人兵四十万众，主收散作无端百恶横行鬼， 太上营兵四十万众，主收地上破坏治化五方不正鬼， 太上柱二天兵四十万众，主收食俗时粮血食为灾鬼， 太上青盖兵四十万人， 太上赤盖兵四十万人， 太上白盖兵四十万人， 太上黑盖兵四十万人， 太上黄盖兵四十万人。 东方青炁君兵百千万重来屯某乙左边， 南方赤炁君兵百千万重来屯某乙右边， 西方白炁君兵百千万重来屯某乙前， 北方黑炁君兵百千万重来屯某乙后， 中央黄炁君兵百千万重来屯某乙身中， 以时传度付某乙身中，各保五方炁侯， 如所列下九兵符辟五方恶逆之鬼贼不正鬼炁，所在里域，速令一切伏灭急急如太上老君律令。 左无上柱天兵四十万人，主收大惑鬼， 右无上五种三十万人，主收新来鬼， 左无上中宫五营兵三十万人，主收大逆鬼， 右无上域门兵三十万人，主收不道鬼， 左无上中大兵三十万人，主收精邪鬼， 右无上九无中野兵三十万人，主收千正鬼， 左无上领天兵三十万人，主收北无逆鬼， 右无上七部官将，主收天地水三官五方不正神奸诈恐动治民者， 玄老玄留大将军十万人， 玄老周天大将军十万人， 玄老中玄大将军十万人， 玄老五无大将军十万人， 玄老盖天大将军十万人， 玄老九天大将军十万人， 玄老中律大将军十万人， 玄老建玄大将军十万人， 玄老还天大将军十万人， 玄老中域大将军十万人， 玄老中微大将军十万人， 玄老中庭大将军十万人， 玄老九天丈人兵十万人，主收亡女称师教者治之， 太上西域兵四十万人，主收新出逆鬼， 太上宫门大兵四十万人，主收新斩大逆鬼， 太上南溪兵四十万人，主收百二十作城天皇鬼， 太上营门兵四十万人，主收角抵鬼， 太上发地兵四十万人，主收天皇鬼， 太上督天兵四十万人，主收自称帝鬼， 太上前受大兵四十万人，主收社灶鬼， 太上北方三秦兵四十万人，主收客死鬼， 太上越天大将军四十万人， 太上正天大将军四十万人， 太上九道大将军四十万人，

chunks.original_text: 八卦护身箓品第十七 炁应九月节，其日角亢，镇云台治，夏至后一百五日寒露。 考召箓品第十八 炁应九月中，其日氏镇浕口治，夏至后一百二十日霜降。 斩邪赤箓品箓第十九 炁应十月节，其日房，镇后城治，夏至后一百三十五日立冬。 辟邪神箓品第二十 炁应十月中，其日心尾，镇公慕治，夏至后一百五十日小雪。 四部禁炁箓品第二十一 炁应十一月节，其日箕，镇平罔治，夏至后一百六十五日大雪。 斩河邪箓品第二十二 炁应十一月中，其日斗，镇主簿治，夏至后一百八十日冬至。 功曹箓品第二十三 炁应十二月节，其日牛，镇玉局治，四冬至后一十五日小寒。 保命长生箓品第二十四 炁应十二月中，其日女，镇北邙治，冬至后三十日大寒。 太上正一八卦护身箓第十七 镇云台治左监贡炁祭酒，属火，在阅州苍溪县，应角亢宿，寒露九月节。 维某年某岁月朔日辰，某州郡县乡里，某法箓弟子某乙，本命某甲子某月日时生，上属北斗某星君，今谨赍法信，诣某法师门下奉受太上太一君皇天上帝□□ 太上元君太一元君玄元始炁八卦，捍厄保命护身秘箓，天帝生我，皇天养我，日月照我，北斗辅我，山川导我，百神侍我，阴阳通我，风伯送我，天厨供我，紫云盖我，神药治我，往来无穷，入海则出天门，入河即出地户，司命举我，何求不得，何指不测，一食千岁，连命日月，与天地元穷，登升天机，驾魁乘刚，所指者亡，身受太上帝君神符，受者敢当，皇天覆我，龙虎使我，朱雀导我，玄武从我，左阳从青龙，右阴据白虎，头戴七星，法应天斗，司命留我年，司录护我命，疾病远我，官事离我，盗贼避我，群星明我，天炁利我，地炁安我，踰河渡海，风浪不起，虎狼见我，摧牙折齿，丹书九通，辟除灾凶，白素为符，凶害灭除，禹为除道，蚩尤避兵，延年元极，与天相毕，急急如律令。 太上正一三五考召箓品第十八 镇尽口治右监贡炁祭酒，属金，在兴元府西县，应氏宿，霜降九月中。 维某年某岁月朔日辰，某州郡县乡里，某法箓弟子某乙，本命某甲子某月日时生，上属北斗某星君，今谨资法 信，诣某法师门下，奉受太清中宫三五

**Register of the Eight Trigrams for Body Protection, Chapter Seventeen**
*Qi* responds to the ninth-month solar term. On this day, the Horn and Neck [lunar mansions] govern. The Cloud Terrace Abbey presides. One hundred and five days after the Summer Solstice: Cold Dew.

**Register for Examination and Summoning, Chapter Eighteen**
*Qi* responds to the mid-ninth month. On this day, the Root [lunar mansion] governs. The Zhenkou Abbey presides. One hundred and twenty days after the Summer Solstice: Frost Descent.

**Crimson Register for Beheading Malevolence, Chapter Nineteen**
*Qi* responds to the tenth-month solar term. On this day, the Chamber [lunar mansion] governs. The Rear City Abbey presides. One hundred and thirty-five days after the Summer Solstice: Beginning of Winter.

**Divine Register for Repelling Malevolence, Chapter Twenty**
*Qi* responds to the mid-tenth month. On this day, the Heart and Tail [lunar mansions] govern. The Gongmu Abbey presides. One hundred and fifty days after the Summer Solstice: Light Snow.

**Register of the Four Divisions for Restraining Qi, Chapter Twenty-One**
*Qi* responds to the eleventh-month solar term. On this day, the Winnowing Basket [lunar mansion] governs. The Pingwang Abbey presides. One hundred and sixty-five days after the Summer Solstice: Heavy Snow.

**Register for Beheading River Malevolence, Chapter Twenty-Two**
*Qi* responds to the mid-eleventh month. On this day, the Dipper [lunar mansion] governs. The Chief Clerk Abbey presides. One hundred and eighty days after the Summer Solstice: Winter Solstice.

**Register of the Merit Officers, Chapter Twenty-Three**
*Qi* responds to the twelfth-month solar term. On this day, the Ox [lunar mansion] governs. The Jade Bureau Abbey presides. Fifteen days after the Winter Solstice: Minor Cold.

**Register for Life Preservation and Longevity, Chapter Twenty-Four**
*Qi* responds to the mid-twelfth month. On this day, the Woman [lunar mansion] governs. The Northern Mang Abbey presides. Thirty days after the Winter Solstice: Major Cold.

---

**The Supreme Orthodox Unity Register of the Eight Trigrams for Body Protection, Chapter Seventeen**
The Cloud Terrace Abbey’s Left Supervisor of *Qi* Libation Officers, affiliated with Fire, located in Cangxi County, Yanzhou Prefecture, corresponds to the Horn and Neck lunar mansions. Ninth-month solar term: Cold Dew.

In the such-and-such year, such-and-such month, such-and-such day, such-and-such hour, disciple so-and-so of the Orthodox Register, from such-and-such prefecture, commandery, county, village, and hamlet, born on such-and-such *jiazi* day, month, and hour, whose fate is bound to the such-and-such Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, now respectfully presents ritual offerings and approaches the gate of Master so-and-so to receive the *Supreme Great Unity Lord, August Heavenly Thearch’s* [missing characters] *Supreme Primordial Lady, Great Unity Primordial Lady, Mysterious Primordial Qi’s* Eight Trigrams Secret Register for Warding Off Calamities, Preserving Life, and Protecting the Body.

The Heavenly Thearch gives birth to me,
August Heaven nurtures me,
Sun and Moon illuminate me,
The Northern Dipper assists me,
Mountains and rivers guide me,
The hundred spirits attend me,
Yin and Yang flow through me,
The Wind Earl escorts me,
The Heavenly Kitchen provisions me,
Purple clouds canopy me,
Divine medicines heal me.

I traverse without end:
Entering the sea, I emerge at Heaven’s Gate;
Entering the river, I exit at Earth’s Portal.
The Director of Destinies elevates me—
What desire remains unfulfilled?
What aim remains unmet?
One meal sustains a thousand years,
My fate linked to the sun and moon,
Coeternal with Heaven and Earth,
Ascending the celestial mechanism,
Mounting the *Kui* and riding the *Gang*.
Where I point, all perishes.

This disciple receives the divine talisman of the Supreme Thearch.
The receiver dares to bear this charge:
August Heaven covers me,
Dragon and Tiger envoys serve me,
Vermilion Phoenix leads me,
Dark Warrior follows me,
Left Yang adheres to the Azure Dragon,
Right Yin rests upon the White Tiger.
My head bears the Seven Stars,
My dharma aligns with the Celestial Dipper.
The Director of Destinies preserves my years,
The Recorder of Deeds guards my life.
Illness flees me,
Official matters depart me,
Bandits and thieves avoid me,
The host of stars brightens my path,
Heaven’s *qi* benefits me,
Earth’s *qi* stabilizes me.

Crossing rivers and seas,
Wind and waves do not rise.
Tigers and wolves seeing me
Break their fangs and shatter their teeth.

Cinnabar script in ninefold transmission
Repels and dispels calamities.
White silk as talisman
Eradicates misfortune and harm.
Yu clears the path,
Chiyou averts warfare.
Prolonging years to the utmost limit,
I complete my destiny with Heaven.

*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances!*

---

**The Supreme Orthodox Unity Three-Five Register for Examination and Summoning, Chapter Eighteen**
The Zhenkou Abbey’s Right Supervisor of *Qi* Libation Officers, affiliated with Metal, located in Xixian County, Xingyuan Prefecture, corresponds to the Root lunar mansion. Mid-ninth month: Frost Descent.

In the such-and-such year, such-and-such month, such-and-such day, such-and-such hour, disciple so-and-so of the Orthodox Register, from such-and-such prefecture, commandery, county, village, and hamlet, born on such-and-such *jiazi* day, month, and hour, whose fate is bound to the such-and-such Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, now respectfully presents ritual offerings and approaches the gate of Master so-and-so to receive the *Great Clarity Central Palace’s Three-Five*...
chunks.overlap_context:
in this lifetime, secure protection from the nine calamities, dissolve myriad evils, and vanish all misfortunes. May I traverse the world, swiftly encounter immortals, prolong my years, and extend my lifespan. May all disasters be subdued and concealed. As this disciple wishes, I humbly receive this in accordance with the Mysterious Regulations and Ordinances.

*Orthodox Unity Alliance Register of the Three-Five, Scroll Five* [End]

chunks.original_text: 将军考召箓，箓中吏兵请给医治百姓， 助国扶命，急急如律令。 上请东方召鬼大将军一万吏兵度， 上请南方召鬼大将军一万吏兵度， 上请西方召鬼大将军一万吏兵度， 上请北方召鬼大将军一万吏兵度， 上请上方召鬼大将军一万吏兵度， 上请下方召鬼大将军一万吏兵度， 上请召灶大将军一万吏兵度， 上请召七祖大将军一万吏兵度， 上请召宅大将军一万吏兵度， 上请召社大将军一万吏兵度， 上请召神大将军八壬吏兵度， 上请召青帝大将军六千吏兵度， 上请召赤帝大将军六千吏兵度， 上请召白帝大将军六千吏兵度， 上请召黑帝大将军六千吏兵度， 上请召黄帝大将军六千吏兵度，. 上请召左仆射大将军六千吏兵度， 上请召右仆射大将军六千吏兵度， 上请召活人大将军二万吏兵度， 上请召煞鬼大将军二万吏兵度， 上请召斩鬼大将军二万吏兵度， 上请召附水大将军四千吏兵度。 上请召附城大将军四千吏兵度， 上请召附鞭大将军四千吏兵度。 太上正一斩邪赤箓品第十九 镇后城治左都炁祭酒，属水，在汉州什那县，应房宿，立冬十月节。 某法箓弟子某乙，命属北斗某星君，即日投道，自实宿绿，有幸得诞人道，虽忝清化，执行顽愚，幽俗下贱，自小及长，常抱疾病淋沥，为奸邪所淫，初无健日，今谨赍法信，诣某法师门下，请受太上正一天灵赤官斩邪大箓将军吏兵营护某乙，随从行来，出入住止，辟斥众邪，收灭精魅，鼋鼉龟龞，狐狸老精，千岁妖怪，百岁孽王，刚柔清浊，山海高下，妖魅巧伪，六天故炁，三魂七魄，安附身神，依如老君律令。 天灵赤官斩邪直曹二人， 天灵赤官斩邪正曹二人，

chunks.original_text: 天灵赤官斩邪治曹二人， 天灵赤官斩邪左曹二人， 天灵赤官斩邪右曹二人， 天灵赤官斩邪都使者二人， 天灵赤官斩邪阳神决吏二人， 天灵赤官斩邪阴神决吏二人， 天灵赤官斩邪阳官太医二人， 天灵赤官斩邪阴神太医二人， 天灵赤官摄邪将军二人， 天灵赤官诛邪将军二人， 天灵赤官伐邪将军二人， 天灵赤官斩邪将军二人， 天灵赤官治邪将军二人， 天灵赤官截邪将军二人， 天灵赤官斩邪阳神将军二人， 天灵赤官斩邪阴神将军二人， 天灵赤官护身将军二人， 天灵赤官擒搏将军二人， 天灵赤官斩邪卫身将军二人， 天灵赤官监邪吏二人， 天灵赤官监邪直符二人， 天灵赤官斩邪使者二人， 天灵赤官斩邪正一使者二人， 天灵赤官斩邪御吏二人， 天灵赤官斩邪刺奸二人， 天灵赤官摄邪护身大神二人， 天灵赤官斩邪擒奇使者二人， 天灵赤官斩邪天医扁鹊二人， 天灵赤官斩邪仙人道士玉女各二人， 天灵赤官青龙朱雀白虎玄武各二人。 天符有常教臣来，北斗鬼神皆怖走，保命延长，青龙侍左，白虎侍右，朱雀导前，玄武从后，三十六仙人扶护左右，使百二十神天符给用地符给粮，出入东西南北，与仙人同行，摄神使者百二十人，与驱使收摄百鬼，南斗护命天符辅身，仙人驾四龙遥诣天门，太上护身，急急如律令。 太上正一辟邪大箓品第二十 镇公慕治右都炁祭酒，属水，在汉州什邡县，应心尾宿，小雪十月中。 某法箓弟子某乙，命属北斗某星君，素以胎生凡夫肉人，百官子孙，有幸建延考犯疾病何邪，今於某年之中，转见进甚，恐是邪精鬼魅，不自分别，今谨依科赍法物，诣某法师门下，求乞拜受太上正一辟邪大箓以自捕捉，受符之日要当如法检身斩绝，不与邪鬼交通，一如太上玄都法罪律令。 符保某身，诸众故炁五酉鬼速去急去，知汝名字，急急如律令。 太上正一四部禁炁箓品第二十一

The celestial talismans bear constant decrees, and when your servant arrives,
The ghostly spirits of the Northern Dipper all flee in terror.
Preserve life and extend longevity—
The Azure Dragon attends on the left,
The White Tiger attends on the right,
The Vermilion Bird leads the way,
The Dark Warrior follows behind.
Thirty-six immortals support and guard on either side,
One hundred twenty spirit talismans of heaven are bestowed for use,
Earth talismans provide sustenance.
Moving east, west, south, or north,
You walk alongside immortals.
One hundred twenty spirit-envoys are dispatched to command,
To drive away and seize the hundred ghosts.
The Southern Dipper’s life-protecting celestial talisman fortifies the body,
Immortals harness four dragons to swiftly ascend to the Heavenly Gate.
The Most High guards the body—*Hasten, hasten, in accordance with statutes and ordinances!*

**Section Twenty of the Orthodox Unity Great Register for Repelling Malevolence**

*Zhen Gongmu, the Right Metropolitan Qi Master of Sacrificial Rites, affiliated with Water, stationed in Shifang County of Hanzhou, corresponding to the Xinwei and Jihai constellations, during the tenth month of the Lesser Snow solar term.*

So-and-so, a disciple of the Orthodox Unity Register, whose fate is governed by the Star Lord of the Northern Dipper’s [X] Star, being a mortal of flesh born of the womb, a descendant of the hundred officials, has unfortunately contracted an illness of unknown origin. In the present year, the condition has worsened, and fearing it may be caused by malevolent spirits or ghostly specters, unable to distinguish clearly, I now respectfully follow the rites and present ritual offerings at the gate of such-and-such a Dharma Master, beseeching to receive the *Orthodox Unity Great Register for Repelling Malevolence* to capture and subdue them. From the day of receiving the talisman, I vow to examine myself in accordance with the Dharma, severing all ties with malevolent ghosts, just as the statutes and ordinances of the Most High’s Mystic Capital command.

The talisman protects my body—
All residual *qi* and the Five You ghosts, depart swiftly, depart at once!
Know your names—*Hasten, hasten, in accordance with statutes and ordinances!*

**Section Twenty-One of the Orthodox Unity Four Divisions Register for Suppressing Qi**

chunks.original_text: 镇平冈治左贡炁祭酒，属水，在蜀州新津县，应箕宿，大雪十一月节。 某法箓弟子某乙，命属北斗某星君，好道乐法，尝游名山，遍历川泽，志慕神仙，今谨赍大刀一口，命米一石二斗，薪一束，绛七尺五寸，银镮一双，白素四十尺，纸一百张，墨一丸，书刀一口，真珠一两，以为誓信，诣某法师门下，求乞拜受太上正一太玄胡玄西玄壶公杂咒法四部禁炁箓，却邪保生，扶家助国佩受，一如太上律令。 子禹步三前还王上吞十二炁， 丑禹步三前还王上吞十二炁，
chunks.translated_text:
The *Zhenping Gangzhi Zuogong Qi* Ritual Master, affiliated with Water, resides in Xinjin County of Shuzhou, corresponding to the *Ji* constellation, during the Great Snow solar term of the eleventh lunar month.

This Dharma Register disciple, so-and-so, whose fate is governed by the such-and-such Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, delights in the Dao and rejoices in the Dharma, having wandered through renowned mountains, traversed rivers and marshes, and aspired to the immortals. Today, I respectfully present:
- one great sword,
- one *shi* and two *dou* of rice,
- one bundle of firewood,
- seven feet and five inches of crimson silk,
- one pair of silver bracelets,
- forty feet of white silk,
- one hundred sheets of paper,
- one inkstick,
- one writing knife,
- one *liang* of true pearls,

as tokens of my solemn vow. chunks.original_text: 禁裸虫用木炁， 禁鳞虫用金炁， 禁羽虫用水炁， 禁毛虫用火炁， 禁甲虫用土炁。 右炁禁法皆如前次第。 某乙奉道精诚，勤修禁戒，至心专一，请受禁炁神仙之法，受者执刀，长跪再拜，发星法取炁步十二时，从子起禹步，左足前右足后，咒之。 言敕汤火文， 又言敕路宿文， 又言敕自防身文， 又言救腊文， 又言敕蛇文， 又言救恶鬼文， 又言救社公毒文， 又言敕印文， 又言敕云中鬼子文， 又言敕臃文， 又言敕都杂符文， 又言敕肿文， 又言敕獝文， 又言救俗家房庙坐席文， 又言敕水鞭文， 又言救虫文， 又言敕师前病家文， 又言敕恶疮文， 又言救俗师文， 又言敕虎狼文， 又言敕食文， 又言敕按摩文， 又言敕他家竹冢文， 又言敕犬文， 又言敕针文， 又言救度杂炁文， 又言敕禁树文， 又言敕刀文， 又言敕蛇虎疮文， 又言敕蚊虻文。 右合三十条牒，度太玄，胡玄，壶公等禁炁杂次，信物并备限。 右据某乙状如前，称素胎生肉人，流俗子孙，千载有幸，制属太上诸君丈人道炁三师以相自保，持前蒙师老赐署重箓治职，得在师任以来，未得明师口诀，求请鲰生肉人，口奏上天曹，愿典者罢塞故炁，愍念群生，助赐星炁，得明道法，宣行有方，救治有效，道炁兴王，用法治病，百鬼皆伏，身中吏兵，尽力传行，毕立神功，迁转名位，凡所禁止，依法施行，又请通炁君十二人，官将百二十人，又请五方炁禁断毒虫虎狼等神将，一合随文度入某乙身中，凡遇禁摄，立使安宁，急急如律令。 胡玄君姓高讳子嵩，身长十丈赤冠，五色之衣，华盖玉床，入镇某乙身中。 右三玄君斗帐玉床四角华盖，入镇某乙身中。 东方青炁吏兵， 南方赤炁吏兵， 西方白炁吏兵， 北方黑炁吏兵， 中央黄炁吏兵， 束方青炁君， 南方赤炁君， 西方白炁君， 北方黑炁君， 中央黄炁君。 右五方真炁君吏等，度入某乙身中，某乙好生乐法，当游名山四海，令五方君史驱逐邪炁，天下地上一切毒虫，咸令摄伏，急急如律令。 太上正一斩河邪箓品第二十二 镇主簿治右贡炁祭酒，属金，邛州蒲江县，应斗宿，冬至十一月中。 某法箓弟子某乙，命属北斗某星君，素以胎生凡夫肉人，专心乐道，或施为不法，被冥考所罚，或疾病是何邪精魅作祟，不自分别，即日依科，谨赍法信，诣某法师门下，求乞拜受太上正一斩河邪箓，受佩之后，永自辅身，断绝鬼祟，不敢与鬼交通，宣行正法，救治百姓，若违背科约之日，坐见中伤，不得怨道咎师，一如太上老君律令。 太上正一三五功曹箓品第二十三 镇玉局治左察炁祭酒，属水，在益州成都县，应牛宿，小雪十二月节。 某法箓弟子某乙，命属北斗某星君，今谨赍法信，诣某法师门下，求受太上正一三五功曹箓，受佩之后，要当扶助医治百姓，不得违背科约，有违之日，坐见中伤，不得怨道咎师，急急如太上老君律令。 太清甲官正一功曹千二百人， 泰清甲官治病功曹千二百人，
chunks.translated_text:
To suppress naked insects, use the *qi* of Wood;
to suppress scaled creatures, use the *qi* of Metal;
to suppress feathered creatures, use the *qi* of Water;
to suppress furred creatures, use the *qi* of Fire;
to suppress armored creatures, use the *qi* of Earth.
The method of *qi*-suppression follows the same sequence as before.

So-and-so, devoted to the Dao with utmost sincerity, diligently cultivates prohibitions and precepts, focusing the mind with single-hearted devotion. They humbly request to receive the divine immortal method of *qi*-suppression. The recipient, holding a blade, kneels and bows twice, then performs the stellar method to draw in *qi*, stepping through the twelve hours, beginning with *zi* and executing the Yu step—left foot forward, right foot behind—while reciting the incantations:

The incantation to command boiling water and fire,
the incantation to command road and lodging,
the incantation to command self-defense,
the incantation to save from the year’s end,
the incantation to command serpents,
the incantation to save from malevolent ghosts,
the incantation to save from the Earth Lord’s poison,
the incantation to command seals,
the incantation to command the ghost-child in the clouds,
the incantation to command swelling,
the incantation to command miscellaneous talismans,
the incantation to command tumors,
the incantation to command madness,
the incantation to save the ancestral halls and seating of lay households,
the incantation to command the water whip,
the incantation to save from insects,
the incantation to command illnesses before the master,
the incantation to command malignant sores,
the incantation to save lay masters,
the incantation to command tigers and wolves,
the incantation to command food,
the incantation to command massage,
the incantation to command bamboo tombs of others,
the incantation to command dogs,
the incantation to command needles,
the incantation to save from miscellaneous *qi*,
the incantation to command trees,
the incantation to command blades,
the incantation to command snake, tiger, and sore afflictions,
the incantation to command mosquitoes and horseflies.

In total, thirty documents are conferred, transmitting the *qi*-suppression methods of the Supreme Mystery, Hu Xuan, and Master Hu, along with all required ritual implements.

As stated in So-and-so’s petition, they are a flesh-born mortal, a descendant of the common folk, fortunate across a thousand generations to be governed by the Lords of the Great Dao, the Venerable Ones, and the *qi* of the Three Masters for self-preservation. Having previously received the esteemed register and office from their master, they have served under their teacher’s guidance but have yet to obtain the oral transmission of the enlightened master. As a humble flesh-born mortal, they now petition the celestial courts, beseeching the cessation of former *qi* and the compassionate bestowal of stellar *qi* to illuminate the Daoist methods. With these, they may propagate the teachings effectively, achieve healing efficacy, uphold the Dao to assist the sovereign, employ the methods to cure illnesses, subdue all ghosts, and ensure the officers and soldiers within their body exert their full power in transmission. Thus, divine merit will be established, ranks and titles advanced, and all prohibitions enforced in accordance with the methods. They further request the twelve *Qi*-Governors and the one hundred twenty officials and generals, as well as the *qi*-suppression generals of the five directions to restrain poisonous insects, tigers, wolves, and the like. Together, these are transmitted into So-and-so’s body, ensuring that all encounters with suppression and restraint bring immediate peace and security. Urgently, as the statutes command.

The Hu Xuan Lord, surnamed Gao, named Zisong, stands ten *zhang* tall, wears a red crown and robes of five colors, and is seated beneath a flowered canopy on a jade bed, entering to guard So-and-so’s body.

The Three Mystery Lords, seated on jade beds beneath canopies at the four corners of the Dipper’s canopy, enter to guard So-and-so’s body.

The officers and soldiers of the azure *qi* of the East,
the officers and soldiers of the vermilion *qi* of the South,
the officers and soldiers of the white *qi* of the West,
the officers and soldiers of the black *qi* of the North,
the officers and soldiers of the yellow *qi* of the Center,
the Azure *Qi*-Lord of the East,
the Vermilion *Qi*-Lord of the South,
the White *Qi*-Lord of the West,
the Black *Qi*-Lord of the North,
the Yellow *Qi*-Lord of the Center.

The true *Qi*-Lords and officers of the five directions are transmitted into So-and-so’s body. As So-and-so delights in the Dao and its methods, they shall traverse famous mountains and the four seas. The officers of the five directions will drive away evil *qi*, and all poisonous creatures on earth and under heaven shall be subdued and pacified. Urgently, as the statutes command.

**Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity’s Slaying the River Demons, Section Twenty-Two**
Overseen by the Registrar of the Right, the Offering *Qi* Libationer, affiliated with Metal, in Pujiang County of Qiong Prefecture, corresponding to the Dipper constellation, during the eleventh month of the winter solstice.

The register disciple So-and-so, whose fate is governed by the Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, being a flesh-born mortal of common descent, devoted to the Dao with a single heart, may have acted unlawfully and suffered punishment from the netherworld, or fallen ill due to malevolent spirits or spectral afflictions, unable to discern the cause. Today, in accordance with the regulations, they humbly present ritual offerings and approach the gate of the Dharma Master to beseech the bestowal of the *Supreme Orthodox Unity’s Register for Slaying River Demons*. Upon receiving and wearing it, they shall forever use it to aid their body, sever all ties with ghosts and demons, and never dare to communicate with spirits. They shall propagate the orthodox methods to heal the people. Should they violate these precepts, they shall suffer harm without blaming the Dao or resenting their master. As the statutes of the Supreme Venerable Lord command.

**Register of the Supreme Orthodox Unity’s Three-Five Merit Officers, Section Twenty-Three**
Overseen by the Left Inspector of *Qi* of the Jade Bureau, the Libationer, affiliated with Water, in Chengdu County of Yizhou Prefecture, corresponding to the Ox constellation, during the *xiaoxue* solar term of the twelfth month.

The register disciple So-and-so, whose fate is governed by the Star Lord of the Northern Dipper, now humbly presents ritual offerings and approaches the gate of the Dharma Master to receive the *Supreme Orthodox Unity’s Register of the Three-Five Merit Officers*. Upon receiving and wearing it, they must assist in healing the people and shall not violate the precepts. Should they transgress, they shall suffer harm without blaming the Dao or resenting their master. Urgently, as the statutes of the Supreme Venerable Lord command.

The One Thousand Two Hundred Merit Officers of the Orthodox Unity of the Great Clarity’s Jia Bureau,
The One Thousand Two Hundred Merit Officers for Healing of the Supreme Clarity’s Jia Bureau...

chunks.original_text: 泰清甲官直使功曹千二百人， 泰清甲官五命功曹千二百人。 上仙都三曹二百人， 上仙都正曹二百人， 上仙都上曹二百人， 上仙都中曹二百人， 上仙都下曹二百人。 上灵官三五功曹十五人， 上灵官正一功曹十五人， 上灵官直使功曹十五人， 上灵官治病功曹十五人， 上灵官扶香使者十五人。 三五功曹，五帝直符，正一功曹，直使功曹，录曹符契。 三五功曹吏十二人， 五帝功曹吏十二人， 直使功曹吏十二人， 正一功曹吏十二人， 香官使者吏十二人。 太上正一延生保命箓品第二十四 镇北邙治右察炁祭酒，属土，在洛京洛阳县，应女宿，大寒十二月中 某乙命属北斗某星君，今谨赍法信，诣某法师门下，求受太上三五保命长生之箓后，要当扶助医治百姓，不得违背科约，有违之日，坐见中伤，不得怨道咎师，急急如太上老君律令。 天灵官扶香使者三人， 天灵官扁鹊医治三人， 天灵官除黑簿使者三人。 监度 保举
